resources.string: Selected contact has no phone numbers
Set the access number in settings
No access number set. Use settings menu to set the access number

* Set the country code prefix (+91 for India) in your contact's number before calling that number.
 * Set access number for Reliance in settings. Find access number for your area at https://www.relianceglobalcall.com/Tollfree.aspx 
 * 408-786-5015 (local access number for the San Francisco bay area) is set by default.
 * Must register your mobile phone number with Reliance before you can make any call.
